title: My League Client is Completely Black.........
body:
Please Help Me! :(

My lol client is completely black. This happens every time I play. Yes, I can still play but I am unable to do anything on the home screen which really bothers me.......
Here is the picture: http://imgur.com/a/zqJ4h

replies.body:
Since the landing page is just a bunch of content loaded from the web, I recommend clearing Internet Explorer's cache, since League uses these settings for the client. You can complete this by using [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ywVrtT4M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-11T21:30:36.088+0000)
>
> Since the landing page is just a bunch of content loaded from the web, I recommend clearing Internet Explorer's cache, since League uses these settings for the client. You can complete this by using [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)
> 
> Let me know if this resolved the issue.

I cleared my browser history and it didn't work it is still black :(

Gotcha. In that case, this is likely caused by Adobe Air failing to grab those assets from the servers. I suggest doing a clean reinstall of Adobe Air by first [uninstalling it](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/instantanswers/ce7ba88b-4e95-4354-b807-35732db36c4d/repair-or-remove-programs) then grabbing a fresh copy of Air [here.](https://get.adobe.com/air/)

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ywVrtT4M,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-12T20:52:45.813+0000)
>
> Gotcha. In that case, this is likely caused by Adobe Air failing to grab those assets from the servers. I suggest doing a clean reinstall of Adobe Air by first [uninstalling it](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/instantanswers/ce7ba88b-4e95-4354-b807-35732db36c4d/repair-or-remove-programs) then grabbing a fresh copy of Air [here.](https://get.adobe.com/air/)
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

I tried uninstalling and reinstalling and it remains  black..................

It sounds like there are probably some network settings we'll need to take a look at to further troubleshoot this. Grab a set of system logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our Tech Specialists will be able to take a look at those logs and suggest further steps.

Let me know if you have issues submitting that ticket.
Thank you for the help I submitted a ticket lets just hope there is a solution to my problem.
Thank you for the help I submitted a ticket lets just hope that there is a solution to my problem.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ywVrtT4M,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-12T20:52:45.813+0000)
>
> Gotcha. In that case, this is likely caused by Adobe Air failing to grab those assets from the servers. I suggest doing a clean reinstall of Adobe Air by first [uninstalling it](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/instantanswers/ce7ba88b-4e95-4354-b807-35732db36c4d/repair-or-remove-programs) then grabbing a fresh copy of Air [here.](https://get.adobe.com/air/)
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

Well I tried and it still didn't work :(. I think I might just uninstall and reinstall (when I have have time because we all know how long it takes to install LOL XD)

But thank you for you time and ill let you know if it works.
